name: Matriochka
description:
Russian dolls "Matriochka" drag and drop game by Laurène B.

Content created during a  " Creative Coding " workshop at Strasbourg (FR) Design School " L'institut Supérieur des Arts Appliqués ". Supervised by Léo Duquesne.  February 2022

A small surprise for you when you open the last doll !
